name: Powerboat Racing Free - Championship Speed Boat Edition
name_original: Powerboat Racing Free - Championship Speed Boat Edition
description:
Powerboat Racing - World Championship Edition is an adrenaline filled racing game where you race Powerboats at FULL SPEED! Start your engines and be prepared for the race of your life!

FEATURES

- Super easy tilt controls!
- No buttons to mess around with. Just pick up and play!
- Gamecenter support! Challenge your friends!
- Custom mixed soundtrack and SFX sounds.
- Fun for all ages! Kids, Dad, Mom, even Grandpa and Grandma!

HOW TO PLAY

- Tilt your phone to control your powerboat.
- Avoid all the oncoming powerboats and take home your trophy!
- Press anywhere on the screen to activate TURBO!
- Have fun!
